mapper.insert: insert into MESSAGE_MANAGER values( message_manager_seq.nextval, #{message_no}, #{admin_no}, #{admin2_no}, sysdate, 0, #{message_manager_type} )
insert into MESSAGE_Member values( message_member_seq.nextval, #{message_no}, #{admin_no}, #{member_no}, sysdate, 0, #{message_member_type} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn,T.*FROM ( SELECT mm.*,m.message_title,m.message_content, CASE WHEN MESSAGE_manager_READ = 0 THEN '0' when MESSAGE_manager_READ> 0 THEN '1' END AS read_count FROM MESSAGE_manager mm left OUTER JOIN message m ON mm.MESSAGE_NO = m.MESSAGE_NO WHERE admin_NO = #{admin_no} and MESSAGE_manager_TYPE = '수신' ORDER BY read_count ASC,mm.MESSAGE_manager_DATE DESC)T) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT count(*) FROM MESSAGE_MANAGER mm LEFT OUTER JOIN admin a ON mm.ADMIN_NO2 = a.ADMIN_NO left OUTER JOIN message m ON mm.MESSAGE_NO = m.MESSAGE_NO WHERE MESSAGE_MANAGER_TYPE = '수신' AND mm.ADMIN_NO =#{admin_no} ORDER BY mm.MESSAGE_MANAGER_READ ASC ,mm.MESSAGE_MANAGER_DATE DESC

SELECT count(*) FROM MESSAGE_Member mm left OUTER JOIN Message m ON m.MESSAGE_NO = mm.MESSAGE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN member a ON mm.MEMBER_NO = a.member_no WHERE mm.ADMIN_NO =#{admin_no} AND mm.MESSAGE_Member_TYPE ='발신' ORDER BY mm.MESSAGE_Member_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn,T.*FROM ( SELECT * FROM MESSAGE_Member mm left OUTER JOIN Message m ON m.MESSAGE_NO = mm.MESSAGE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN member a ON mm.MEMBER_NO = a.member_no WHERE mm.ADMIN_NO =#{admin_no} AND mm.MESSAGE_Member_TYPE ='발신' ORDER BY mm.MESSAGE_Member_DATE DESC )T)WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn,T.*FROM ( SELECT a.admin_name ,mm.*,m.MESSAGE_TITLE ,m.MESSAGE_CONTENT FROM MESSAGE_MANAGER mm left OUTER JOIN Message m ON m.MESSAGE_NO = mm.MESSAGE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN admin a ON mm.ADMIN_NO2 = a.ADMIN_NO WHERE mm.ADMIN_NO =#{admin_no} AND mm.MESSAGE_MANAGER_TYPE ='발신' ORDER BY mm.MESSAGE_MANAGER_DATE DESC )T)WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT count(*) FROM MESSAGE_MANAGER mm left OUTER JOIN message m ON mm.MESSAGE_NO = m.MESSAGE_NO WHERE MESSAGE_MANAGER_TYPE = '수신' AND mm.ADMIN_NO = #{admin_no} AND mm.MESSAGE_MANAGER_READ =0
SELECT count(*) FROM MESSAGE_member mm left OUTER JOIN message m ON mm.MESSAGE_NO = m.MESSAGE_NO WHERE MESSAGE_MEMBER_TYPE = '수신' AND mm.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} AND mm.MESSAGE_MEMBER_READ =0

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn,T.*FROM ( SELECT mm.*,m.message_title,m.message_content, CASE WHEN MESSAGE_MEMBER_READ = 0 THEN '0' when MESSAGE_MEMBER_READ> 0 THEN '1' END AS read_count FROM MESSAGE_MEMBER mm left OUTER JOIN message m ON mm.MESSAGE_NO = m.MESSAGE_NO WHERE MEMBER_NO = 27 ORDER BY read_count ASC,mm.MESSAGE_MEMBER_DATE DESC)T) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM message WHERE MESSAGE_NO IN (SELECT a.MESSAGE_NO FROM message a LEFT OUTER JOIN MESSAGE_MANAGER b ON a.MESSAGE_NO =b.MESSAGE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MESSAGE_MEMBER c ON a.MESSAGE_NO =c.MESSAGE_NO WHERE b.MESSAGE_MANAGER_NO IS NULL AND c.MEMBER_NO IS null)
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT rownum rn,T.*FROM (SELECT * FROM MESSAGE_MEMBER mm left OUTER JOIN message m ON mm.MESSAGE_NO = m.MESSAGE_NO WHERE MESSAGE_MEMBER_TYPE = '수신' AND mm.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} ORDER BY mm.MESSAGE_MEMBER_READ ASC ,mm.MESSAGE_MEMBER_DATE DESC)T)
